description:
Oda Nobunaga`s conquest of Japan made him a lot of enemies. And after an attack on the Asakura clan, allies to his brother-in-law Azai Nagamasa, he inadvertently gives rise to a partnership that might spell his own doom!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Nobunaga Houimou, Sono Kage ni Combi Ai Ari!
The Nobunaga Encirclement, and the Partnerships That Made It!
信長包囲網, その影にコンビ愛あり!
